input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
Magic Metal Polished Quartz Bullet Black Crystal Necklace Druzy Mystic Boho Pendant Silver Tone NN30 Fashion Jewelry

Product specifications:
Ships from the USA
Black Quartz Crystal Set in a Silver Tone Empty Bullet Casing.
Crystal Pendant Measures 2 inches. Chain Laying Flat measures 30 inches.
Makes a perfect gift.
Search Magic Metal Jewelry for more jewelry styles.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This stunning Magic Metal Polished Quartz Bullet Black Crystal Necklace Druzy Mystic Boho Pendant Silver Tone NN30 Fashion Jewelry is a perfect addition to your wardrobe. The elegant black quartz crystal is set in a silver tone empty bullet casing, making it a unique and stylish accessory that will complement any outfit. This pendant measures 2 inches in length and is paired with a silver tone chain that measures 30 inches in length. This makes a great gift for loved ones or as a treat for yourself. Magic Metal Jewelry offers a wide variety of unique and trendy jewelry styles to choose from, so be sure to search their collection for even more options.
input_text.Response B: The Black Crystal Necklace is a beautiful piece of handmade jewelry. The pendant is a black crystal, which is set in a silver tone empty bullet casing. The chain is a silver tone as well and is 30 inches long. The necklace is part of the Magic Metal Jewelry line and is made in the USA. It is a great gift for someone special or just to treat yourself.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.factors_a: you could tell it was not a human responce
